abilities.desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.
abilities.name: Hoof Stomp

abilities.desc: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on your strength. Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.
abilities.name: Double Edge
abilities.notes: Double Edge deals magic type damage to both the targets and himself.

abilities.desc: Centaur counters all attacks, dealing damage back to the attacker. Returns a fixed amount plus a percentage of your strength. Deals half damage to towers.
abilities.name: Retaliate

abilities.desc: Centaur tosses an ally into a cart hitched behind him. While in the cart, Centaur gains the benefit of Stampede and the ally can still cast and attack normally, but cannot move independently or be targeted by opponents. Non-targeted effects can still affect the hitched ally. Increases the attack range of melee heroes by 200.
abilities.name: Hitch A Ride

abilities.desc: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and slow any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner\'s strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.
abilities.name: Stampede
